events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and are eager to review their qualifications.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on their experience as a software developer.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to guide the candidate through the hiring process.
The recruiter conducted the initial screening call to assess the candidate's background and enthusiasm for the software engineering role.
The candidate responded promptly with additional details on their technical skills and expressed strong interest in progressing to the interview stage.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team next week to evaluate coding and problem-solving abilities.
